DOC.brief_summary: Exploratory trial evaluate efficacy safety D565H twice daily versus D565 daily .
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety D565H Twice Daily Versus D565 Once Daily
DOC.detailed_description: A Multi center , Randomized , Double-blind , Parallel design , Exploratory trial evaluate efficacy safety D565H twice daily versus D565 daily primary open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . More age 19 year old 2 . Subjects primary OpenAngle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension 3 . Subjects sign inform consent form willingly 1 . Subjects IOP ( Intraocular Pressure ) measure Visit 1 Visit 2 ( AM 09:00 ) 35 mmHg one eye 2 . Subjects maximum correct visual acuity le 0.3 select evaluation eye visit 2 3 . Subjects diagnose monocular eye Acute Chronic ClosedAngle Glaucoma Secondary Glaucoma Pseudoexfoliation Glaucoma Neovascular Glaucoma aphakia phacocyst capsular torn intraocular lens 4 . Subjects significant eye symptoms/signs ( Abscesses , diplopia ) severe visual field impairment ( Mean Deviation 25dB ) 5 . Subjects severe dry eye syndrome progressive retinal disease ( Retinal degeneration , Diabetic retinopathy , Retinal detachment , Macular edema ) 6 . Subjects inflammatory/infectious eye disease active eye disease within last 3 month 7 . Subjects medical history follow Glaucoma surgery Subjects significant history ocular trauma last 6 month , underwent surgical ophthalmic surgery Subjects receive topical systemic steroid within last 6 month 8 . Subjects wear need wear contact lenses study 9 . Subjects drug interaction investigational product , significant effect intraocular pressure , may effect clinical trial result 10 . Subjects know hypersensitivity investigational product 11 . Women nurse , pregnant planning pregnancy study 12 . Subjects bronchial asthma history 13 . Subjects receive investigational product within 1 month prior first dose 14 . Impossible subject participate clinical trial investigator 's decision
